original_text: But it shall not be well with the wicked, neither shall he prolong his days, which are as a shadow; because he feareth not before God.
korean_text: 악인은 잘 되지 못하며 장수하지 못하고 그 날이 그림자와 같으리니 이는 하나님을 경외하지 아니함이니라

sentences.original_text: But it shall not be well with the wicked
neither shall he prolong his days
because he feareth not before God
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 하나님 앞에서 두려워하지 않음이니라
